TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EasingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义模式，从 中派生的类将在这些模式下执行缓动。

span.span: Defines the modes in which classes derived from perform their easing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了不同的值 ，其中*f*（*t*）表示动画进度， *t*表示时间。The following graphs demonstrate the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![BackEase EasingMode 图。](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode 图。")![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.") ![BounceEase EasingMode 图。](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode 图。")![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CircleEase EasingMode 图。](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode 图。")![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CubicEase EasingMode 图。](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode 图。")![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.") ![带不同缓动模式图的 ElasticEase。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式图的 ElasticEase。")![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![具有不同缓动模式的 ExponentialEase 图。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式的 ExponentialEase 图。")![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.") ![带不同缓动模式图的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式图的 QuarticEase。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![具有不同缓动模式的图形的带](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式图的 QuadraticEase")![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") ![带不同缓动模式图的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式图的 QuarticEase。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![带不同缓动模式图的 QuinticEase。](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "带不同缓动模式图的 QuinticEase。")![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase")![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseIn = int32(0)

summary.span: 内插时使用与缓动函数关联的数学公式。

span.span: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseInOut = int32(2)

summary.span: 对于第一部分动画，内插时使用 ，对于第二部分动画，内插时使用 。

span.span: Interpolation uses for the first half of the animation and for the second half.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseOut = int32(1)

summary.span: 内插时使用 100% 内插值减去与缓动函数关联的公式输出结果之后的值。

span.span: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
